lab.util.commands

Class Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab.util.commands.Commands

  • public class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
    Commands class contains static methods to receive commands classes and supported methods for them.
    Since:
    1.6.0

      • getCommand

        public static Command getCommand(java.lang.String command)
                          throws InvalidArgumentsException
        Factory method that returns object of command.
        Parameters:
        command - String from command line that contains command name and its arguments.
        Returns:
        command object.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentsException - if arguments of command is incorrect.

                           throws InvalidArgumentsException

        Returns:
        packed location
        Throws:

      • packLocations

                            throws InvalidArgumentsException

        Parameters:
        fileName - file name where saved locations in xml format.
        Returns:
        packed locations
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentsException - if json format of all locations isn't valid or unexpected situation during parsing happened.
